member.name: T:CustomControls.ExtendedScrollBar
member.summary:
Represents a scroll with specific support for binding to a scrollviewer.
Implemented as a derived class of the parent.

remarks.para: . Retain all features of a standard scrollbar.
. Include an additional property to use for binding specifically on a scrollviewer.
